main event: A night watchman observed an orange and flashing red light in the sky for 3 minutes before it disappeared without a sound.
interesting points: The object was noted to be brighter than the brightest stars,The observation took place in Minster, Ohio on 6 October 1967,The object disappeared suddenly after 3 minutes of observation,There were 2 witnesses to the sighting,The conclusion from the report was insufficient data for further investigation.
